name: Master Cargo Truck Driving 3D
description:
Master Cargo Truck Driving 3D experience the heavy load. With this ultimate automobile transporter game, you’ll test your driving skills at parking cars inside the transporters and driving the big trucks yourself.
Features:
Transportation car chauffeur 3D challenging and outstanding environment.
Clock is ticking so drop the passengers on time.
Extreme precision 3d transportation car simulator.
Great dynamic game play.
Superb sound effects.
Amazing 3d graphics.
